resources.string: This is a story about this person:
Just kidding it doesn\'t do anything

But yeah this isn\'t actually a story because development time got way out of hand. No, this is more just a really drawn out long way of saying \"I love you\" because it turns out that doesn\'t really take that long to say. About 3 seconds really.
Seriously look, that\'s how long it takes:
It\'s probably actually faster than that. Kinda short, huh? Seems kinda wrong doesn\'t it? Totally incommensurate with the value of the thing I should think.
So let\'s not do that. Let\'s try and do it for at least this long:
